entry.title: PHP Live Regex
entry.content:
Ferramenta online para criar e testar expressões regulares em PHP.

PHP Live Regex - A Live Regular Expression Tester for PHP

Fonte: http://www.phpliveregex.com/

entry.title: 3v4l
entry.content:
Execute o seu código em mais de 150 versões de de PHP e HHVM.

3v4l.org is an online shell that allows you to run your code on my server. I compiled more than 150 different PHP versions (every version released since 4.3.0) plus HHVM for you to use.

https://3v4l.org/

entry.title: PHP: The Right Way
entry.content:
PHP: The Right Way é uma leitura obrigatória para todo desenvolvedor PHP. Abordando os padrões e melhores práticas de desenvolvimento.

There’s a lot of outdated information on the Web that leads new PHP users astray, propagating bad practices and insecure code. PHP: The Right Way is an easy-to-read, quick reference for PHP popular coding standards, links to authoritative tutorials around the Web and what the contributors consider to be best practices at the present time.

Fonte: http://www.phptherightway.com/

entry.title: Awesome PHP
entry.content:
Awesome PHP é um repositório no Github que reúne os mais variados conteúdos relacionados à PHP.

A curated list of amazingly awesome PHP libraries, resources and shiny things.

Fonte: https://github.com/ziadoz/awesome-php
